identity.title: Finding Adjacent Duplicates in a Sequence of Numbers

content.prompt: Construct a program that checks whether a sequence of numbers, entered one at a time, contains adjacent duplicates. The user enters -1 to indicate the end of the input.\nFor example, 4 is a duplicate in the sequence of numbers 1, 3, 4, 4, -1.
